name: unofficial-bsu-portal
description: An unofficial portal for checking student's grades using publicly accessible batstate-u.edu.ph endpoints. Uses GraphQL under REST API for the backend and ReactJS + Bulma.io for the frontend

scripts.postinstall: cd bsu-portal-graphql-server && npm install && cd ../bsu-portal-react-frontend && npm install
scripts.start: concurrently "cd bsu-portal-graphql-server && npm start" "cd bsu-portal-react-frontend && npm run build && serve -s build -l 80"
scripts.start-dev: concurrently "cd bsu-portal-graphql-server && npm start" "cd bsu-portal-react-frontend && npm start"

author: Kristian Espina
